name: Dynamic Post Grid Elementor Addon
author: DynamicWebLab

sections.description:
Dynamic Post Grid Plugin is user-friendly and can be used as an Elementor Add-on. This Post Grid Plugin allows you to create 3 different styles: Grid, List, and Slider view effortlessly.

Grid Demo | List Demo | Slider Demo

üèÜ How To install Dynamic Post Grid Elementor Addon:

üèÜ Dynamic Post Grid Elementor Add-on üèÜ

Dynamic Post Grid Elementor Add-on is a powerful plugin designed to enhance the functionality of the Elementor page builder. With its intuitive interface and robust features, this widget empowers users to create dynamic and visually stunning post grids effortlessly.
The addon for Elementor provides a sophisticated and versatile interface for presenting your blog posts and content.

Designed with both beginners and professional developers in mind, this addon requires no coding knowledge, yet offers a fully customizable experience for a truly professional web design. Elevate your blogging site with this next-generation blogging architect, which is structured to capture more traffic and boost your website’s performance.

Developed using the highest standards for WordPress, the Dynamic Post Grid add-on is fully compatible with the latest versions of PHP, CSS, JavaScript, HTML5, and the WordPress core. Rather than slowing down your website, this plugin serves as an intelligent tool that boosts your online presence.

üèÜ Dynamic Post Grid Layout Styles üèÜ

There are a total 3 available styles including it has 7 additional layout variations, Grid Layout it is 3 layout variations, List layout has 2 layout variations and Slider layout has 2 layout variations. All Grid, List and Slider layouts are responsive for all the different screen sizes.

This powerful plugin puts you in control of your content curation. Fetch any post, page, or custom post type with flexible filters and sorting. Handpick what content items are showcased from available options. Elevate your presentation with a choice of list, grid, or slider views, each customizable to suit your style.

üèÜ Dynamic Post Grid Features üèÜ

  • No Coding Skills Needed: This is very direct about the lack of coding requirement.
  • User-Friendly Interface: This emphasizes that the interface itself is designed for ease of use.
  • Make It Yours with Easy Customization: This has a friendly, inviting tone, emphasizing personalization.
  • Instant Results, Every Time: This focuses on the benefit of speed (getting what you need quickly).
  • Made for Page Builder: Display any post types to page builder easily. Smart Post Show is made to work with Page Builders like Elementor page builder.
  • Your Content, Optimized for Every Screen: This positions responsiveness as a key feature of the plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Go to Plugins > Add New and search for “Dynamic Post Grid Elementor Addon” , install and activate it.
  2. We are good to go. No configuration needed.
  3. Post Grid is added under WPC Elements on Elementor page customization panel.
sections.faq:
Does the plugin require Elementor?

Yes, this is an addon of the Elementor page builder. so it needs Elementor to be installed and activated to work.

Does this plugin work with all themes?

Yes, it works with all themes.

How many layouts are available on this plugin?

It comes with 3 layouts.

  • Design fix

  • [Feature] Added 1 new List layout

  • [Feature] Added 2 new List layout
  • [Feature] Added 2 new Slider layout
  • Added new settings for elementor widget
  • Few performance update for css
  • Add custom image control for layout style

1.0.1

  • Update read me
  • [Improvment] Comments few methods

1.0.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Post Grid Elementor Addon offers various options such as grid, list & slider. Create any kind of News, Magazine, and Blogging sites.
